title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips On-site educational programs are available for all grade levels, from a standard museum tour to several more extensive programs. All Field Trips     Guest Speakers Can't make it to the TR Site right now?  Speakers on a variety of topics can come to you!  A wide array of topics are available, from the Teddy bear to Theodore "Teddy" Roosevelt to Buffalo's Pan-American Exposition.  Programs are available for adult groups and school audiences. All Guest Speakers
